body_html:
@harshini-gadige Sorry for late response. Currently, I omitted the MPI support by skipping build flags (not to use distributed tensorflow, for a while.) Moreover, the brand-new release 1.12.0 came out recently; therefore, I have lots of configurations to test.

As @jthestness mentioned about several configurations for baseline, I'll try multiple builds for my desire.

  • OS: CentOS 7.5 x86_64
  • Host: KVM (due to the lack of physical hosts however it won't give any hardship)
  • GCC: 8.2.0 (custom build, since native 4.8.x won't build r1.12.0rc2 in my experience)
  • TF: 1.8/1.9/1.10.0/1.11.0/1.12.0

If there are any progresses or unexpected results, I'll leave some comments.
Thx for your consideration.

Regards,
@inscite

body:
@harshini-gadige Sorry for late response. Currently, I omitted the MPI support by skipping build flags (not to use distributed tensorflow, for a while.) Moreover, the brand-new release 1.12.0 came out recently; therefore, I have lots of configurations to test.

As @jthestness mentioned about several configurations for baseline, I'll try multiple builds for my desire.
- OS: CentOS 7.5 x86_64
- Host: KVM (due to the lack of physical hosts however it won't give any hardship)
- GCC: 8.2.0 (custom build, since native 4.8.x won't build r1.12.0rc2 in my experience)
- TF: 1.8/1.9/1.10.0/1.11.0/1.12.0

If there are any progresses or unexpected results, I'll leave some comments.
Thx for your consideration.

Regards,
@inscite
